1.0.name: wordpress/shongkha
1.0.description:
A very simple plugin to change Date, Time, Months and Days in Bangla. It will change default Archive and Calendar Widget too. It's a Beta version, It may have some issue or conflict. Please let me know by support forum, so, I can fix these and make it rich enough.

Please rate this plugin if you think it is helpful.
